verse: हिरण्यज्योतिर्यस्मिन्नयमात्माधिक्षियन्ति भुवनानि विश्वा। आत्मानं द्विधाऽकरोदर्धेन स्त्री | अर्धेन पुरुषो देवो भूत्वा देवानसृजदृषिर्भूत्वा ऋषीन्यक्षराक्षसमन्धर्वान्ग्राम्यानारण्यांश्च पशूनसृज- दितरा गौरितरोऽनङ्वानितरा वडवेतरोऽश्व इतरा गर्दभीतरो गर्दभ इतरा विश्वभरीतरो विश्वभरः ॥
meaning: ।Meaning:In this golden light, all the worlds rule themselves. The self divided itself in two ways, becoming female and male. Having become gods, they created the gods, sages, yakshas, rākshasas, celestial musicians, rural beings, woodlands creatures, and animals. They also created cows and others, horses and others, donkeys and others, horses, donkeys, and other beings. They are the universal sustainer, encompassing everything.
